summary: Completed validation testing of Life Insurance STP Rule Engine. System continues to work perfectly with 100% success rate for both backend and frontend. All core features functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Seed data functionality (/api/seed) - 3 products, 10 rules seeded
Products CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Rules CRUD operations with filtering and toggle
Dashboard page loads with stats cards and charts
Sidebar navigation across all pages working
Rules List page displays 10 seeded rules
Products page displays 3 products (Term Life, Endowment, ULIP)
Evaluation Console with form elements functional
STP evaluation returning PASS/FAIL decisions correctly
Case type classification working (Direct Accept, Direct Fail, etc.)
Rule execution with proper evaluation time tracking
